sentences.sentence: Alternate nostril breathing optimizes both sides of your brain, so you can access your whole brain and all the benefits that go with it.
sentences.translation: 交替鼻孔呼吸能够充分利用你大脑的两边，因此你可以使用你的整个大脑以及随之而来的所有好处。

sentences.sentence: Is paying-it-forward a Lean idea that optimizes the whole?
sentences.translation: “传递支付”是一种优化全局的精益思想吗？
